title: a1708 no backlight

title: a1708 no backlight
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

What board do you have, 00840, or 00875?
Next time, post the model in the title, please.

Do you get image for sure on the internal screen?
Did you check external video?
Also check for USB activity.

title: a1708 no backlight
message: 820-00875-01 this is the model number... i use flashlight on the screen i see image in the screen..

title: a1708 no backlight
message: Do you get any voltage at PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT?

title: a1708 no backlight
message: i dont have voltage in  PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT .. no short in  PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT ..

title: a1708 no backlight
message: diode mode reading 1.0 red to ground then black probe to  PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT line

title: a1708 no backlight
message:
U8400 voltage check
ihave voltages on
VDDD PIN5 = 5V
VDDA PIN 18= 5V
EDP_BKLT_EN=0v (no short)
.....................................................
I have check voltage in f8400 it says 13.07v
what do next?

title: a1708 no backlight
message:
Really strange, EDP_BKLT_EN comes from PCH and you have image.
Try doing PRAM reset 2-3 times.
If no change, then try known good LCD assembly.

title: a1708 no backlight
message: may I ask what is the voltage of EDP_BKLT_EN?

title: a1708 no backlight
message: is this how to pram reset?.. option key +command+ P+ R?.. then 3x chime right?

title: a1708 no backlight
message: i test the board without lcd

title: a1708 no backlight
message:
Do you mean EDP_BKLT_EN was 0V [B][U]without[/U][/B] LCD connected?
What did you expect in such case, if PCH didn't detect the LCD?

Always check voltage and signals video related [B][U]with[/U][/B] LCD connected.

title: a1708 no backlight
message:
This point to flexgate issue.
Backlight circuit works, but there is no connection with LEDs strip.
